text: The Ironclads series of board wargames is Avalanche Press's new series about naval combat in the mid-1800s. The series is loosely based on the company's Great War at Sea, and features operational and tactical level gameplay. ==Games== Hearts of Iron is the first game in the Ironclads series, covers naval combat in 1864 and 1866, including the battles of Helgoland, Swinemunde, and Lissa ==External links== * Avalanche Press' Hearts of Iron page * Category:Avalanche Press games Category:Naval board wargames
